tool_input.command:
git add -A && git commit -m "Add multi-language project support

- Created auto-detect runner for Node, Go, Python, Terraform, Rust, Java
- Added project-specific config templates for common languages
- Created MULTI_LANGUAGE.md comprehensive guide
- Workflow now auto-detects project structure (no src/ requirement!)

Features:
âœ“ Auto-detects project type from indicator files
âœ“ Finds source/test directories automatically  
âœ“ Uses appropriate coverage tools per language
âœ“ Supports custom project configurations
âœ“ Works with ANY project structure

Supported: Node.js, Go, Python, Terraform, Rust, Java, and more

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
" && git push
